featured.text: For an easy and 36 alternative, nutritionists suggest that we pop our own popcorn.

definition.zh_def: 營養師：專門研究食物和營養對健康影響的專業人士。
definition.en_def: A nutritionist is a professional who specializes in the study of food and its effects on health.
definition.example: The nutritionist recommended a balanced diet rich in fruits and vegetables.
